main event: A UFO sighting was reported on July 4, 1967, in Bellbrook, Ohio, where the observer described seeing an unidentified flying object.
interesting points: The observer reportedly saw the object moving quickly before stopping and fading out., The object was described as a bright white light, unlike any regular aircraft., The observer was accompanied by others who confirmed seeing the object., The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 minutes., Multiple reports related to UFOs were submitted to the U.S. Air Force as part of Project Blue Book.
witness description: The witnesses described seeing a bright white light moving in the sky, with no special experience in aviation.
